info.description: This is the API documentation for Ticket Zetu application
info.title: Ticket Zetu API

get.description: Retrieves an artist profile by ID or UserID.

post.description: Creates a new artist profile for the authenticated user. Fields like genres, skills, and featured_works can be a single string or an array of strings.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation failed

403.description: Unauthorized: can only create profile for self

delete.description: Deletes the authenticated user's artist profile

patch.description: Updates the authenticated user's artist profile

get.description: Checks if a username is available and provides suggestions if taken

post.description: Logs out the user and invalidates the session
Updates the user's password using a valid reset token
Sends a password reset link to the user's email based on username or email

parameters.description: Username or email for password reset
parameters.name: request

post.description: Logs in a user and returns session tokens
Creates a new user account and sends a verification email
Verifies a user's email address using the verification code

get.description: Retrieving  All Categories.

post.description: Creates a new category.

get.description: Retrieving  All Categories  With their Subcategories.
Retrieves details of a specific Category by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a specific category by ID

get.description: Retrieves all subcategories under a specific category

put.description: Activates or deactivates a specific category

400.description: Invalid request body or category ID

post.description: Uploads an image for a specified category or subcategory
post.summary: Add an image to a category or subcategory

403.description: User lacks permission to modify category image

404.description: Category or subcategory for image not found

500.description: Internal server error while adding category image

delete.description: Removes the image associated with a specified category or subcategory
delete.summary: Delete an image from a category or subcategory

403.description: User lacks permission to delete category image

404.description: Category or subcategory for image not found

500.description: Internal server error while deleting category image

get.description: Retrieves a list of events for the authenticated organizer, with optional field selection.
get.summary: Retrieve all events for an organizer

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include (e.g., id,title,subcategory_id,description,venue_id,total_seats,available_seats,start_time,end_time,price_tier_id,base_price,is_featured,status)
parameters.name: fields

post.description: Creates a new event with its details, validates organizer status, subcategory, venue, and handles image associations.

parameters.description: Event details including venue, category, and optional images
parameters.name: input

403.description: User lacks permission or organizer is inactive, flagged, or banned

post.description: Adds a single image to an event, with an optional primary flag. If set as primary, demotes existing primary image. Users can upload up to 5 images per event, one at a time in separate requests.
post.summary: Add an image to an event

parameters.description: Image file (max 10MB, JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, MP4, MPEG, WEBM)
parameters.name: image

400.description: Invalid form data, file type, file size, ID format, or exceeded image limit

403.description: User lacks permission or organizer is inactive

404.description: Event not found or not owned by organizer

delete.description: Deletes an event image from both database (soft delete) and cloud storage using event and image IDs.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific event by ID for the authenticated organizer, with optional field selection.
get.summary: Retrieve a single event for an organizer

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include (e.g., id,title,subcategory_id,description,venue_id,total_seats,available_seats,start_time,end_time,price_tier_id,base_price,is_featured,status)
parameters.name: fields

400.description: Invalid event ID format or invalid request

put.description: Updates an event with the provided details

404.description: Event, venue or subcategory not found

delete.description: Deletes an event and its associated resources

get.description: Retrieve logs with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by log level (e.g., info, error)
parameters.name: level

parameters.description: Filter by log level (e.g., info, error)
parameters.name: level

post.description: Uploads an image for a specific organization

delete.description: Deletes the image associated with a specific organization

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of organizations with limited or full details based on user permissions

post.description: Creates a new organizer with the provided details

get.description: Retrieves the organizer associated with the authenticated user
Searches organizers by name or creator, with pagination
Retrieves details of a specific organizer by its ID

400.description: Invalid organizer ID format or organizer is active

patch.description: Toggles the banned status of an organizer
Sets an organizer's status to inactive

400.description: Invalid organizer ID format or already inactive

patch.description: Marks or unmarks an organizer as flagged
Toggles the active/inactive status of an organizer

get.description: Get list of permissions with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new permission
Assigns a permission to a role if the user has sufficient permissions
post.summary: Assign a permission to a role

delete.description: Removes a permission from a role if the user has sufficient permissions
delete.summary: Remove a permission from a role

get.description: Retrieve a permission by its ID

put.description: Update a permission by its ID

delete.description: Delete a permission by its ID

get.description: Retrieves all price tiers across all organizations (paginated)

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in response
parameters.name: fields

post.description: Create a new price tier for the organizer

get.description: Retrieves all price tiers belonging to the authenticated user's organization

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in response
parameters.name: fields

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific price tier

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in response
parameters.name: fields

400.description: Invalid price tier ID or cannot delete default price tier

get.description: Retrieves a list of roles with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new role if the user has sufficient permissions
Assigns a role to a user if the user has sufficient permissions
post.summary: Assign a role to a user

get.description: Retrieves a role by its ID

put.description: Updates a role by its ID if the user has sufficient permissions

delete.description: Deletes a role by its ID if the user has sufficient permissions

post.description: Creates a new subcategory under a specific category

409.description: Subcategory name already exists in this category

put.description: Updates the details of a specific subcategory

404.description: Subcategory or parent category not found

409.description: Subcategory name already exists in this category

delete.description: Deletes a specific subcategory by ID

put.description: Activates or deactivates a specific subcategory

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of organizers the user is subscribed to
Retrieves a paginated list of subscribers for the user's organizer

404.description: No organizer found for this user

patch.description: Bans a subscriber from an organizer

400.description: Invalid request body or subscriber ID

patch.description: Updates the subscription preferences for an organizer

400.description: Invalid request body or organizer ID

post.description: Subscribes the authenticated user to an organizer

delete.description: Unsubscribes the authenticated user from an organizer

post.description: Creates a new TicketType.

get.description: Retrieves all ticket types for a specific event
get.summary: Get ticket types for an event

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in response
parameters.name: fields

get.description: Retrieves all ticket types belonging to the user's organization
get.summary: Get all ticket types for an organization

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in response
parameters.name: fields

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific ticket type

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in response
parameters.name: fields

delete.description: Deletes a specific ticket type (cannot delete default or in-use ticket types)

400.description: Invalid ticket type ID or cannot delete default ticket type

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's profile

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's basic profile details
Updates the authenticated user's email, requiring verification
Uploads a new profile image for the authenticated user
post.summary: Add or update a user's profile image

403.description: User lacks permission to modify profile image

500.description: Internal server error while adding profile image

delete.description: Removes the profile image for the authenticated user

403.description: User lacks permission to delete profile image

500.description: Internal server error while deleting profile image

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's location details
Updates the authenticated user's phone number

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's preferences

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's preferences

get.description: Retrieves a user's profile by ID, username, or email, respecting privacy settings
Retrieves notifications for the logged-in user, with optional filters for unread only or module.

400.description: Invalid user ID or query parameters

403.description: User not authorized to view notifications

delete.description: Deletes all notifications for the logged-in user or those before a specified date.

400.description: Invalid user ID or date format

403.description: User not authorized to delete notifications

patch.description: Marks one notification or all unread notifications as read for the logged-in user.

403.description: User not authorized to update notifications

get.description: Retrieves all Venues for the Organizer

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameters.name: fields

post.description: Create a new venue.

get.description: Retrieve a venue by ID.

parameters.description: Fields to include in the response, comma-separated
parameters.name: fields

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific Venue by its ID for the Organizer

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameters.name: fields

post.description: Add an image to a venue.

delete.description: Delete an image from a venue.

bio.example: Emerging EDM artist known for high-energy live shows.

description.example: An open-air festival with live performances, food, and fun.

timezone.description: No need to validate oneof if internal doesn't enforce it

description.example: Allows a user to create events
Role with permissions to manage events
Access to VIP lounge and priority entry

bio.example: Emerging EDM artist known for high-energy live shows.

notes.example: Preferred partner with high ticket volumes.
